A0: Wisconsin Pork Association , in conjunction with
RelatedSentence: Wisconsin Pork Association , in conjunction with the National Pork Board , will host the We Care trailer at two upcoming events in Wisconsin .
Breakfast will be served from 6 to 10 a.m. Volunteers are needed from 5:30 to 11 a.m. Volunteers will receive paid mileage and tickets to the breakfast .
